findings.title: SWC-120: Weak Sources of Randomness from Chain Attributes
findings.description: The contract uses chain attributes (e.g., block.timestamp, block.number) as a source of randomness. This can make the contract predictable and vulnerable to attacks.

findings.title: SWC-108: State Variable Default Visibility
findings.description: State variable visibility is not set.

findings.title: Mint
findings.description: The 'Mint' function has been tested but its deployment status is unverified.
